00001 /*********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Name:         v1740.c
00004   Created by:   Pierre-A. Amaudruz / K.Olchanski
00005 
00006   Contents:     V1740 64 ch. 12bit 65Msps
00007  
00008   $Id: v1740.c 5218 2011-10-27 21:21:53Z svn $
00009 *********************************************************************/
00010 #include <stdio.h>
00011 #include <stdint.h>
00012 #include <string.h>
00013 #include "v1740drv.h"
00014 #include "mvmestd.h"
00015 
00016 // Buffer organization map for number of samples
00017 uint32_t V1740_NSAMPLES_MODE[11] = { (1024*192), (512*192), (256*192), (128*192), (64*192), (32*192)
00018                                ,(16*192), (8*192), (4*192), (2*192), (192)};
00019 
00020 /*****************************************************************/
00021 /*
00022 Read V1740 register value
00023 */
00024 static uint32_t regRead(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int offset)
00025 {
00026   mvme_set_am(mvme, MVME_AM_A32);
00027   mvme_set_dmode(mvme, MVME_DMODE_D32);
00028   return mvme_read_value(mvme, base + offset);
00029 }
00030 
00031 /*****************************************************************/
00032 /*
00033 Write V1740 register value
00034 */
00035 static void regWrite(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int offset, uint32_t value)
00036 {
00037   mvme_set_am(mvme, MVME_AM_A32);
00038   mvme_set_dmode(mvme, MVME_DMODE_D32);
00039   mvme_write_value(mvme, base + offset, value);
00040 }
00041 
00042 /*****************************************************************/
00043 uint32_t v1740_RegisterRead(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int offset)
00044 {
00045   return regRead(mvme, base, offset);
00046 }
00047 
00048 /*****************************************************************/
00049 void v1740_RegisterWrite(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int offset, uint32_t value)
00050 {
00051   regWrite(mvme, base, offset, value);
00052 }
00053 
00054 /*****************************************************************/
00055 void v1740_Reset(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base)
00056 {
00057   regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_SW_RESET, 0);
00058 }
00059 
00060 /*****************************************************************/
00061 void v1740_TrgCtl(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t reg, uint32_t mask)
00062 {
00063   regWrite(mvme, base, reg, mask);
00064 }
00065 
00066 /*****************************************************************/
00067 void v1740_GroupCtl(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t reg, uint32_t mask)
00068 {
00069   regWrite(mvme, base, reg, mask);
00070 }
00071 
00072 /*****************************************************************/
00073 void v1740_GroupSet(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t channel, uint32_t what, uint32_t that)
00074 {
00075   uint32_t reg, mask;
00076 
00077   if (what == V1740_GROUP_THRESHOLD)   mask = 0x0FFF;
00078   if (what == V1740_GROUP_DAC)         mask = 0xFFFF;
00079   reg = what | (channel << 8);
00080   //  printf("base:0x%x reg:0x%x, this:%x\n", base, reg, that);
00081   regWrite(mvme, base, reg, (that & mask));
00082   that = regRead(mvme, base, (V1740_GROUP_STATUS | (channel << 8)));
00083   //  printf("Group %d  status:0x%x\n", channel, that);
00084 }
00085 
00086 /*****************************************************************/
00087 uint32_t v1740_GroupGet(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t channel, uint32_t what)
00088 {
00089   uint32_t reg, mask;
00090 
00091   if (what == V1740_GROUP_THRESHOLD)   mask = 0x0FFF;
00092   if (what == V1740_GROUP_DAC)         mask = 0xFFFF;
00093   reg = what | (channel << 8);
00094   return regRead(mvme, base, reg);
00095 }
00096 
00097 /*****************************************************************/
00098 void v1740_AcqCtl(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t operation)
00099 {
00100   uint32_t reg;
00101   
00102   reg = regRead(mvme, base, V1740_ACQUISITION_CONTROL);  
00103   switch (operation) {
00104   case V1740_RUN_START:
00105     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg | 0x4));
00106     break;
00107   case V1740_RUN_STOP:
00108     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg & ~(0x4)));
00109     break;
00110   case V1740_REGISTER_RUN_MODE:
00111     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg & ~(0x3)));
00112     break;
00113   case V1740_SIN_RUN_MODE:
00114     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg | 0x01));
00115     break;
00116   case V1740_SIN_GATE_RUN_MODE:
00117     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg | 0x02));
00118     break;
00119   case V1740_MULTI_BOARD_SYNC_MODE:
00120     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg | 0x03));
00121     break;
00122   case V1740_COUNT_ACCEPTED_TRIGGER:
00123     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg | 0x08));
00124     break;
00125   case V1740_COUNT_ALL_TRIGGER:
00126     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg & ~(0x08)));
00127     break;
00128   case V1740_DOWNSAMPLE_ENABLE:
00129     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg & 0x10));
00130     break;
00131   case V1740_DOWNSAMPLE_DISABLE:
00132     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg & ~(0x10)));
00133     break;
00134   default:
00135     break;
00136   }
00137 }
00138 
00139 /*****************************************************************/
00140 void v1740_GroupConfig(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t operation)
00141 {
00142   uint32_t reg;
00143   
00144   regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_GROUP_CONFIG, 0x10);  // must be set to 1
00145   reg = regRead(mvme, base, V1740_GROUP_CONFIG);  
00146   printf("Channel_config1: 0x%x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_GROUP_CONFIG));  
00147   switch (operation) {
00148   case V1740_TRIGGER_UNDERTH:
00149     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_GROUP_CONFIG, (reg | 0x40));
00150     break;
00151   case V1740_TRIGGER_OVERTH:
00152     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_GROUP_CONFIG, (reg & ~(0x40)));
00153     break;
00154   default:
00155     break;
00156   }
00157   printf("Channel_config2: 0x%x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_GROUP_CONFIG));  
00158 }
00159 
00160 /*****************************************************************/
00161 void v1740_info(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int *ngroups, uint32_t *n32word)
00162 {
00163   int i, grpmask;
00164 
00165   // Evaluate the event size
00166   // Number of samples per group (8 channels)
00167   *n32word = 8 * V1740_NSAMPLES_MODE[regRead(mvme, base, V1740_BUFFER_ORGANIZATION)];
00168 
00169   // times the number of active group
00170   grpmask = 0xff & regRead(mvme, base, V1740_GROUP_EN_MASK); 
00171   *ngroups = 0;
00172   for (i=0;i<8;i++) {
00173     if (grpmask & (1<<i))
00174       *ngroups += 1;
00175   }
00176   
00177   *n32word = *n32word * *ngroups * 12 / 32;  // 12bit/Sample , 32bits/DW
00178   *n32word += 4;    // Headers
00179 }
00180 
00181 /*****************************************************************/
00182 uint32_t v1740_BufferOccupancy(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t group)
00183 {
00184   uint32_t reg;
00185   reg = V1740_GROUP_BUFFER_OCCUPANCY + (group<<16);
00186   return regRead(mvme, base, reg);
00187 }
00188 
00189 
00190 /*****************************************************************/
00191 uint32_t v1740_BufferFree(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int nbuffer)
00192 {
00193   int mode;
00194 
00195   mode = regRead(mvme, base, V1740_BUFFER_ORGANIZATION);
00196   if (nbuffer <= (1<< mode) ) {
00197     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_BUFFER_FREE, nbuffer);
00198     return mode;
00199   } else
00200     return mode;
00201 }
00202 
00203 /*****************************************************************/
00204 uint32_t v1740_BufferFreeRead(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base)
00205 {
00206   return regRead(mvme, base, V1740_BUFFER_FREE);
00207 }
00208 
00209 /*****************************************************************/
00210 uint32_t v1740_DataRead(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t *pdata, uint32_t n32w)
00211 {
00212   uint32_t i;
00213 
00214   mvme_set_am(  mvme, MVME_AM_A32);
00215   mvme_set_dmode(  mvme, MVME_DMODE_D32);
00216   for (i=0;i<n32w;i++) {
00217     *pdata = regRead(mvme, base, V1740_EVENT_READOUT_BUFFER);
00218     //    printf("DataRead base:0x%x add:0x%x idx:%d 0x%x\n", base, V1740_EVENT_READOUT_BUFFER, i, *pdata);
00219     if (*pdata != 0xffffffff)
00220       pdata++;
00221     else
00222       break;
00223   }
00224   return i;
00225 }
00226 
00227 /********************************************************************/
00228 /** v1740_DataBlockRead
00229 Read N entries (32bit) 
00230 @param mvme vme structure
00231 @param base  base address
00232 @param pdest Destination pointer
00233 @return nentry
00234 */
00235 uint32_t v1740_DataBlockRead(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t *pdest, uint32_t *nentry)
00236 {
00237   int status, ngroups;
00238 
00239   mvme_set_am(  mvme, MVME_AM_A32);
00240   mvme_set_dmode(  mvme, MVME_DMODE_D32);
00241   v1740_info(mvme, base, &ngroups, nentry);
00242   // *nentry = 0xFFFFFF & regRead(mvme, base, V1740_EVENT_READOUT_BUFFER);
00243   //  printf("DataBlockRead n32w:%d 0x%x\n", *nentry, *nentry);
00244   mvme_set_blt(  mvme, MVME_BLT_MBLT64);
00245   //
00246   // Transfer in MBLT64 (8bytes), nentry is in 32bits
00247   status = mvme_read(mvme, pdest, base+V1740_EVENT_READOUT_BUFFER, *nentry<<2);
00248   mvme_set_blt(  mvme, 0);
00249   if (status != MVME_SUCCESS)
00250     return 0;
00251 
00252   return (*nentry);
00253 }
00254 
00255 
00256 /*****************************************************************/
00257 void  v1740_Status(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base)
00258 {
00259   printf("================================================\n");
00260   printf("V1740 at A32 0x%x\n", (int)base);
00261   printf("Board ID           (0xEF08)  : 0x%x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_BOARD_ID));
00262   printf("Board Info         (0x8140)  : 0x%x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_BOARD_INFO));
00263   printf("ROC FPGA FW Rev    (0x8124)  : 0x%x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_ROC_FPGA_FW_REV));
00264   printf("Group Config       (0x8000)  : 0x%8.8x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_GROUP_CONFIG));
00265   printf("Group0 Threshold   (0x1080)  : 0x%8.8x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_GROUP_THRESHOLD));
00266   printf("Group0 DAC         (0x1098)  : 0x%8.8x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_GROUP_DAC));
00267   printf("Group0 Ch Trg Mask (0x10A8)  : 0x%8.8x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_CH_TRG_MASK));
00268   printf("Acquisition control(0x8100)  : 0x%8.8x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_ACQUISITION_CONTROL));
00269   printf("Acquisition status (0x800C)  : 0x%8.8x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_ACQUISITION_STATUS));
00270   printf("Trg Src En Mask    (0x810C)  : 0x%8.8x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_TRIG_SRCE_EN_MASK));
00271   printf("FP Trg Out En Mask (0x8110)  : 0x%8.8x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_FP_TRIGGER_OUT_EN_MASK));
00272   printf("FP IO Control      (0x811C)  : 0x%8.8x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_FP_IO_CONTROL));
00273   printf("Group Enable Mask  (0x8120)  : 0x%8.8x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_GROUP_EN_MASK));
00274   printf("VME Control        (0xEF00)  : 0x%8.8x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_VME_CONTROL));
00275   printf("VME Status         (0xEF04)  : 0x%8.8x\n", regRead(mvme, base, V1740_VME_STATUS));
00276   printf("================================================\n");
00277 }
00278 
00279 /*****************************************************************/
00280 /**
00281 Sets all the necessary paramters for a given configuration.
00282 The configuration is provided by the mode argument.
00283 Add your own configuration in the case statement. Let me know
00284 your setting if you want to include it in the distribution.
00285 - <b>Mode 1</b> : 
00286 
00287 @param *mvme VME structure
00288 @param  base Module base address
00289 @param mode  Configuration mode number
00290 @return 0: OK. -1: Bad
00291 */
00292 int  v1740_Setup(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int mode)
00293 {
00294   switch (mode) {
00295   case 0x0:
00296     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00297     printf("Setup Skip\n");
00298     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00299   case 0x1:
00300     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00301     printf("Trigger from FP, 8 group, 1Ks, postTrigger 800\n");
00302     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00303     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_ACQUISITION_CONTROL,   0x00);   // Reset Acq Control
00304     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_BUFFER_ORGANIZATION,  0x0A);    // 1K Nbuffers=1024, bufferSize=192
00305     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_TRIG_SRCE_EN_MASK,    0x4000);  // External Trigger
00306     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_GROUP_EN_MASK,      0xFF);    // 8grp enable
00307     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_POST_TRIGGER_SETTING, 800);     // PreTrigger (1K-800)
00308     printf("\n");
00309     break;
00310   case 0x2:
00311     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00312     printf("Trigger from LEMO\n");
00313     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00314     regWrite(mvme, base, V1740_BUFFER_ORGANIZATION, 1);
00315     printf("\n");
00316     break;
00317   default:
00318     printf("Unknown setup mode\n");
00319     return -1;
00320   }
00321   v1740_Status(mvme, base);
00322   return 0;
00323 }
00324 
00325 /*****************************************************************/
00326 /*-PAA- For test purpose only */
00327 #ifdef MAIN_ENABLE
00328 int main (int argc, char* argv[]) {
00329 
00330   uint32_t V1740_BASE  = 0x32100000;
00331 
00332   MVME_INTERFACE *myvme;
00333 
00334   uint32_t data[100000], n32word, n32read, nevt;
00335   int status, group, i, ngroups, chanmask;
00336 
00337   if (argc>1) {
00338     sscanf(argv[1],"%x", &V1740_BASE);
00339     printf("Base:0x%x\n", V1740_BASE);
00340   }
00341 
00342   // Test under vmic
00343   status = mvme_open(&myvme, 0);
00344 
00345   v1740_Setup(myvme, V1740_BASE, 1);
00346   // Run control by register
00347   v1740_AcqCtl(myvme, V1740_BASE, V1740_REGISTER_RUN_MODE);
00348   // Soft or External trigger
00349   v1740_TrgCtl(myvme, V1740_BASE, V1740_TRIG_SRCE_EN_MASK     , V1740_SOFT_TRIGGER|V1740_EXTERNAL_TRIGGER);
00350   // Soft and External trigger output
00351   v1740_TrgCtl(myvme, V1740_BASE, V1740_FP_TRIGGER_OUT_EN_MASK, V1740_SOFT_TRIGGER|V1740_EXTERNAL_TRIGGER);
00352   // Enabled groups
00353   v1740_GroupCtl(myvme, V1740_BASE, V1740_GROUP_EN_MASK, 0x0F);
00354   //  sleep(1);
00355 
00356   group = 0;
00357   // Start run then wait for trigger
00358   v1740_AcqCtl(myvme, V1740_BASE, V1740_RUN_START);
00359 
00360   regWrite(myvme, V1740_BASE, V1740_SOFTWARE_TRIGGER, 0); 
00361   sleep(1);
00362   regWrite(myvme, V1740_BASE, V1740_SOFTWARE_TRIGGER, 0); 
00363   sleep(1);
00364   regWrite(myvme, V1740_BASE, V1740_SOFTWARE_TRIGGER, 0); 
00365 
00366   // Evaluate the event size
00367   // Number of samples per groups
00368   n32word  =  1<<regRead(myvme, V1740_BASE, V1740_BUFFER_ORGANIZATION);
00369   // times the number of active groups
00370   chanmask = 0xff & regRead(myvme, V1740_BASE, V1740_GROUP_EN_MASK); 
00371   for (ngroups=0, i=0;i<8;i++) 
00372     if (chanmask & (1<<i))
00373       ngroups++;
00374   printf("chanmask : %x translante in %d groups of 8 channels each\n", chanmask, ngroups);
00375   n32word *= ngroups;
00376   n32word /= 2;   // 2 samples per 32bit word
00377   n32word += 4;   // Headers
00378   printf("Expected n32word:%d\n", n32word);
00379 
00380   //  printf("Occupancy for group %d = %d\n", group, v1740_BufferOccupancy(myvme, V1740_BASE, group)); 
00381 
00382 #if 0
00383   do {
00384     status = regRead(myvme, V1740_BASE, V1740_ACQUISITION_STATUS);
00385     printf("Acq Status1:0x%x\n", status);
00386   } while ((status & 0x8)==0);
00387   
00388   n32read = v1740_DataRead(myvme, V1740_BASE, &(data[0]), n32word);
00389   printf("n32read:%d\n", n32read);
00390   
00391   for (i=0; i<n32read;i+=4) {
00392     printf("[%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x\n"
00393            , i, data[i], i+1, data[i+1], i+2, data[i+2], i+3, data[i+3]);
00394   }
00395   
00396   v1740_AcqCtl(myvme, V1740_BASE, V1740_RUN_STOP);
00397 #endif
00398 
00399   // Read Data
00400   nevt = regRead(myvme, V1740_BASE, V1740_EVENT_STORED);
00401   n32word = regRead(myvme, V1740_BASE, V1740_EVENT_SIZE);
00402   printf("nevt:%d n32word:%d\n", nevt, n32word);
00403       
00404 #if 1
00405   n32read = v1740_DataRead(myvme, V1740_BASE, &(data[0]), n32word);
00406 #endif
00407 #if 0
00408   n32read = v1740_DataBlockRead(myvme, V1740_BASE, &(data[0]), &n32word);
00409 #endif
00410   printf("n32read:%d  n32requested:%d\n", n32read, n32word);
00411   
00412   for (i=0; i<32;i+=4) { // n32read;i+=4) {
00413     printf("[%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x - [%d]:0x%x\n"
00414            , i, data[i], i+1, data[i+1], i+2, data[i+2], i+3, data[i+3]);
00415   }
00416   
00417   v1740_AcqCtl(myvme, V1740_BASE, V1740_RUN_STOP);
00418   
00419   regRead(myvme, V1740_BASE, V1740_ACQUISITION_CONTROL);
00420   status = mvme_close(myvme);
00421 
00422   return 1;
00423 
00424 }
00425 #endif
